GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Compare a given property to another one based on the city it is in and the asking price

templateVersions.content:
You are going to compare properties based on their asking prices provided in the user input. Your task is to identify properties where the asking prices are within $20,000 of each other.
User Input Example: "Show me properties similar to {!$Input:Property.Name}"
Instructions: 1. Query the property with the given name in the user input 2. Look at the property's {!$Input:Property.Price__c}, then query other records in the property object that have {!$Input:Property.Price__c} that is plus or minus $20,000 of the asking price of {!$Input:Property.Name} from the user input. 3. Provide a list of the properties that match the criteria.
Response Format: - If the prices are within $20,000, respond with a list of the properties, providing the {!$Input:Property.Price__c} - If the prices are not within $20,000, respond with: "There are no such properties here"
Example Response: - "1. {!$Input:Property.Name} - Address: {!$Input:Property.Address__c} Asking Price: {!$Input:Property.Price__c} 2. {!$Input:Property.Name} - Address: {!$Input:Property.Address__c} - Asking Price: {!$Input:Property.Price__c}"
